items.sentence: Tom and Mary were eating lunch when John walked in the door.
Now that Tom is unemployed, he has quite a bit of free time.
Please get in touch with me as soon as you arrive in Boston.
It doesn\'t look like Tom and Mary are going to get married.
It looks like it might rain, so don\'t forget your umbrella.
Tom closed his diary after writing about that day\'s events.
Tom can\'t come to work today because he doesn\'t feel well.
No matter how much I think about it, I can\'t understand it.
No matter how much I think about it, I don\'t understand it.
Tom doesn\'t know if he\'ll be able to visit us next Monday.
I should study tonight, but I\'m tired so I\'m going to bed.
Why didn\'t you guys tell me you didn\'t want to go camping?
Why didn\'t you tell me you couldn\'t do it without my help?
Tom always checks the caller ID before he answers the phone.
Tom and Mary exchange more than 200 text messages every day.
Tom asked me if I would be willing to contribute some money.
Tom believes that the universe really has eleven dimensions.
Mary and her family came to the train station to see us off.
Mary used her smartphone as a mirror to touch-up her makeup.
Mary usually has a few glasses of wine while cooking dinner.
